DOC.brief_summary: 25 patients, treated by brachytherapy in a phase II study "Mammosite" (from 2003 to 2005), will be asked to attend a clinical exam in order to evaluate the late cutaneous toxicity due to brachytherapy. During this consultation, a blood sample will be taken for analysis ( rate of CD8 T-Lymphocyte Apoptosis)
DOC.brief_title: Research for Predictive Biologic Parameters of Cutaneous Hypersensitivity After Brachytherapy in Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This is an interventional study for the french law
DOC.criteria: All patient treated by exclusive peroperative brachytherapy in the prior study Mammosite for breast cancer Patient with social security
